carrierComesToTheCountryToReceiver: Carrier brings the good to the country where receiver lives. Then if receiver sees that the good is suitable for him, he proves it in the app, and carrier gets his money.
companyThatUnitesPeopleETC:

errorUpdateAvatar: Error while trying to update avatar
errorUpdated: Error when trying to update user
holdMoney:

ifYouAreInTheCountry:
If you are in a country where you don't have any goods you need.
You can request it and wait for the carrier's respond
or respond to the carrier's offer yourself.
ifYouWantToVisitAnotherCountry:
If you want to visit another country,
you can deliver goods to the country you are going to
for people who need something.
By fulfilling orders, you earn money.
oneIfYouCarrier: If you are a carrier, you need to choose a receiver to deliver a good
oneIfYouReceiver: If you are a receiver, than you need to choose carrier, who will buy you a good you need.
passErrorUpdated: Error when trying to update password
priceSum: Carrier points the price of good, then to the result sum added our commission and profit for carrier. Receiver pays the sum.
theRecipientPaysForThePackage: The recipient pays for the package and we hold the entire amount in our account until the recipient confirms they received the item. After that we send the money to the carrier.
weChargeACommissionFor: We charge a commission for what we found for your carrier/receiver, but the price will be low.
youHaveNoOrdersYet: You don't have any orders yet.
yourAllDataWillBe: All your data will be confident. Your money will be safe.
